word_mean: 活体解剖：对活体动物进行外科解剖，从事研究

PerfectNetExp.abs: 北京功勋警犬菲生的可悲下场:被活体解剖警员博物馆需要一条活狗做标本,最后... 虽然活体解剖(vivisection)在字面上意谓切割活生生的生命,但是它包含所有有关动物.

list.abs: some believe that it is rather brutal to carry out vivisection experiments because animals are human's good friends and they have the rights to survive .有些人认为做活体实验很残酷是因为动物应该人类的好朋友，应该有他们生存的权利。
the author supports vivisection because it brings a benefit . the speaker opposes it because he finds it unethical .作者支持动物实验，因为它带来很多好处。演讲者反对它，因为他感到这是不道德的。
People no longer vivisect animals -- it ' s considered unethical., 人们不再活体解剖动物 , 因为这被认为是不道德的.
people no longer vivisect animals -- it ' s considered unethical., 人类不再解剖动物 － 这被认为是不道德的.
to perform vivisection on chinese pows and civilians ., 对中国俘虏和平民进行活体解剖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin vivus 'living', on the pattern of dissection

entry.def: Vivisection is the practice of using live animals for scientific experiments.

example.tran: 动物活体解剖的激烈反对者

means.word_mean: 1. the act of operating on living animals (especially in scientific research)

auth_sentence.content: The great naturalist loved all living creatures but defended vivisection.
auth_sentence.res_content: The great naturalist loved all living creatures but defended vivisection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The great naturalist loved all living creatures but defended vivisection.

auth_sentence.content: The whole question of the ethics of vivisection is just quicksand.
auth_sentence.res_content: The whole question of the ethics of vivisection is just quicksand.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The whole question of the ethics of vivisection is just quicksand.
